result.reason: Adding a debug dump tool will significantly improve the ability to diagnose issues reported by users by aggregating logs, configuration (sanitized), and environment details.
result.approach: Implement a `DebugDumper` class to collect `mRemoteNG.log`, sanitized `confCons.xml`, and system environment details, compressing them into a zip file. Add a 'Generate Debug Bundle' menu item under the Help menu to trigger this action.
